					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 261
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:first_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = first_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 257: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_SPOUSE -> EventsSex.MF_WHIP_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.257
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 257
				scope:first_transition_1 = 257
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 11
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 257
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.19
	}
	option = {
		# 258: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_SPOUSE -> EventsSex.MF_FOOTJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.258
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 258
				scope:first_transition_1 = 258
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 11
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 258
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.20
	}
	option = {
		# 259: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_SPOUSE -> EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.259
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 259
				scope:first_transition_1 = 259
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 11
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 259
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.21
	}
	option = {
		# 260: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_SPOUSE -> EventsSex.MF_DICK_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.260
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 260
				scope:first_transition_1 = 260
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 11
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 260
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.23
	}
	option = {
		# 261: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_SPOUSE -> EventsSex.MF_ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.261
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 261
				scope:first_transition_1 = 261
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 11
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 261
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.22
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}
	after = {
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}
LIDAf.12 = {
	# MF_MEETING_WITH_SPOUSE_INITIAL: Flowers in Bloom
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.12.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.12.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:root_stamina
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:garden
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_WHIP_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 262
				}
			}
			# MF_FOOTJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 263
				}
			}
			# MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 264
				}
			}
			# MF_DICK_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 265
				}
			}
			# MF_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 266
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_WHIP_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 262
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 262
				}
			}
			# MF_FOOTJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 263
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 263
				}
			}
			# MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 264
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 264
				}
			}
			# MF_DICK_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 265
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 265
				}
			}
			# MF_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 266
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 266
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:first_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = first_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 262: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_SPOUSE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.MF_WHIP_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.262
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 262
				scope:first_transition_1 = 262
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 12
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 262
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.19
	}
	option = {
		# 263: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_SPOUSE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.MF_FOOTJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.263
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 263
				scope:first_transition_1 = 263
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 12
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 263
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.20
	}
	option = {
		# 264: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_SPOUSE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.264
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 264
				scope:first_transition_1 = 264
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 12
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 264
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.21
	}
	option = {
		# 265: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_SPOUSE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.MF_DICK_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.265
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 265
				scope:first_transition_1 = 265
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 12
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 265
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.23
	}
	option = {
		# 266: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_SPOUSE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.MF_ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.266
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 266
				scope:first_transition_1 = 266
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 12
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 266
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.22
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}
	after = {
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}
LIDAf.13 = {
	# MF_MEETING_WITH_VASSAL: Chains of Command
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.13.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.13.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:root_stamina
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:study
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_WHIP_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 267
				}
			}
			# MF_FOOTJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 268
				}
			}
			# MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 269
				}
			}
			# MF_DICK_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 270
				}
			}
			# MF_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 271
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_WHIP_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 267
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 267
				}
			}
			# MF_FOOTJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 268
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 268
				}
			}
			# MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 269
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 269
				}
			}
			# MF_DICK_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 270
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 270
				}
			}
			# MF_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 271
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 271
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:first_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = first_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 267: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_VASSAL -> EventsSex.MF_WHIP_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.267
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 267
				scope:first_transition_1 = 267
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 13
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 267
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.19
	}
	option = {
		# 268: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_VASSAL -> EventsSex.MF_FOOTJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.268
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 268
				scope:first_transition_1 = 268
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 13
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 268
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.20
	}
	option = {
		# 269: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_VASSAL -> EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.269
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 269
				scope:first_transition_1 = 269
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 13
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 269
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.21
	}
	option = {
		# 270: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_VASSAL -> EventsSex.MF_DICK_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.270
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 270
				scope:first_transition_1 = 270
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 13
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 270
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.23
	}
	option = {
		# 271: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_VASSAL -> EventsSex.MF_ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.271
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 271
				scope:first_transition_1 = 271
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 13
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 271
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.22
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}
	after = {
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}
LIDAf.14 = {
	# MF_MEETING_WITH_VASSAL_INITIAL: Privileges of Power
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.14.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.14.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:root_stamina
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:study
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_WHIP_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 272
				}
			}
			# MF_FOOTJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 273
				}
			}
			# MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 274
				}
			}
			# MF_DICK_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 275
				}
			}
			# MF_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 276
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_WHIP_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 272
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 272
				}
			}
			# MF_FOOTJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 273
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 273
				}
			}
			# MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 274
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 274
				}
			}
			# MF_DICK_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 275
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 275
				}
			}
			# MF_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 276
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 276
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:first_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = first_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 272: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_VASSAL_INITIAL -> EventsSex.MF_WHIP_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.272
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 272
				scope:first_transition_1 = 272
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 14
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 272
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.19
	}
	option = {
		# 273: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_VASSAL_INITIAL -> EventsSex.MF_FOOTJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.273
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 273
				scope:first_transition_1 = 273
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 14
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 273
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.20
	}
	option = {
		# 274: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_VASSAL_INITIAL -> EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.274
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 274
				scope:first_transition_1 = 274
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 14
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 274
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.21
	}
	option = {
		# 275: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_VASSAL_INITIAL -> EventsSex.MF_DICK_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.275
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 275
				scope:first_transition_1 = 275
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 14
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 275
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.23
	}
	option = {
		# 276: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_VASSAL_INITIAL -> EventsSex.MF_ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.276
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 276
				scope:first_transition_1 = 276
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 14
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 276
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.22
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}
	after = {
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}
LIDAf.15 = {
	# MF_MEETING_WITH_LIEGE: Mead in my Room?
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.15.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {

LIDAf.16 = {
	# MF_MEETING_WITH_LIEGE_INITIAL: An Intimate Discussion
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.16.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = throne_room_bow_1
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.16.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:root_stamina
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:council_chamber
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_WHIP_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 282
				}
			}
			# MF_FOOTJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 283
				}
			}
			# MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 284
				}
			}
			# MF_DICK_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 285
				}
			}
			# MF_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 286
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_WHIP_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 282
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 282
				}
			}
			# MF_FOOTJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 283
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 283
				}
			}
			# MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 284
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 284
				}
			}
			# MF_DICK_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 285
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 285
				}
			}
			# MF_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 286
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 286
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:first_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = first_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 282: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_LIEGE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.MF_WHIP_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.282
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 282
				scope:first_transition_1 = 282
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 16
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 282
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.19
	}
	option = {
		# 283: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_LIEGE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.MF_FOOTJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.283
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 283
				scope:first_transition_1 = 283
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 16
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 283
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.20
	}
	option = {
		# 284: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_LIEGE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.284
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 284
				scope:first_transition_1 = 284
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 16
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 284
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.21
	}
	option = {
		# 285: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_LIEGE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.MF_DICK_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.285
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 285
				scope:first_transition_1 = 285
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 16
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 285
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.23
	}
	option = {
		# 286: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_LIEGE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.MF_ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.286
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 286
				scope:first_transition_1 = 286
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 16
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 286
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.22
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}
	after = {
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}
LIDAf.17 = {
	# MF_MEETING_WITH_PRISONER: Taste of Heaven in Hell
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.17.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = prisonhouse
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.17.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:root_stamina
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:dungeon
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_WHIP_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 287
				}
			}
			# MF_FOOTJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 288
				}
			}
			# MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 289
				}
			}
			# MF_DICK_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 290
				}
			}
			# MF_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 291
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_WHIP_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 287
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 287
				}
			}
			# MF_FOOTJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 288
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 288
				}
			}
			# MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 289
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 289
				}
			}
			# MF_DICK_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 290
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 290
				}
			}
			# MF_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 291
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 291
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:first_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = first_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 287: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_PRISONER -> EventsSex.MF_WHIP_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.287
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 287
				scope:first_transition_1 = 287
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 17
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 287
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.19
	}
	option = {
		# 288: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_PRISONER -> EventsSex.MF_FOOTJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.288
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 288
				scope:first_transition_1 = 288
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 17
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 288
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.20
	}
	option = {
		# 289: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_PRISONER -> EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB_TEASE

		trigger = {

				scope:first_transition_0 = 289

			name = sex_transition
			value = 289
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.21
	}
	option = {
		# 290: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_PRISONER -> EventsSex.MF_DICK_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.290
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 290
				scope:first_transition_1 = 290
			}
		}

			name = prev_event
			value = 17
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 290
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.23
	}
	option = {
		# 291: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_PRISONER -> EventsSex.MF_ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.291
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 291

		save_scope_value_as = {

			value = 17
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 291
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.22
	}

		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}

	}

	# MF_MEETING_WITH_PRISONER_INITIAL: The Sweetest Torture
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.18.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = prisonhouse
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.18.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:root_stamina
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:dungeon
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_WHIP_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 292
				}
			}
			# MF_FOOTJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 293
				}
			}
			# MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 294
				}
			}
			# MF_DICK_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 295
				}
			}
			# MF_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 296
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_WHIP_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 292
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 292
				}
			}
			# MF_FOOTJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 293
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 293
				}
			}
			# MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 294
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 294
				}
			}
			# MF_DICK_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 295
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 295
				}
			}
			# MF_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 296
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 296
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:first_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = first_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 292: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_PRISONER_INITIAL -> EventsSex.MF_WHIP_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.292
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 292
				scope:first_transition_1 = 292
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 18
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 292
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.19
	}
	option = {
		# 293: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_PRISONER_INITIAL -> EventsSex.MF_FOOTJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.293
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 293
				scope:first_transition_1 = 293
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 18
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 293
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.20
	}
	option = {
		# 294: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_PRISONER_INITIAL -> EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.294
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 294
				scope:first_transition_1 = 294
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 18
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 294
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.21
	}
	option = {
		# 295: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_PRISONER_INITIAL -> EventsSex.MF_DICK_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.295
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 295
				scope:first_transition_1 = 295
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 18
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 295
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.23
	}
	option = {
		# 296: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_PRISONER_INITIAL -> EventsSex.MF_ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.296
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 296
				scope:first_transition_1 = 296
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 18
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 296
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.22
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}
	after = {
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}

LIDAf.19 = {
	# MF_MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE: Who Owns Who
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.19.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.19.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:root_stamina
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:sitting_room
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_WHIP_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 297
				}
			}
			# MF_FOOTJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 298
				}
			}
			# MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 299
				}
			}
			# MF_DICK_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 300
				}
			}
			# MF_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 301
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_WHIP_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 297
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 297
				}
			}
			# MF_FOOTJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 298
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 298
				}
			}
			# MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 299
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 299
				}
			}
			# MF_DICK_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 300
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 300
				}
			}
			# MF_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 301
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 301
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:first_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = first_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 297: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE -> EventsSex.MF_WHIP_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.297
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 297
				scope:first_transition_1 = 297
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 19
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 297
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.19
	}
	option = {
		# 298: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE -> EventsSex.MF_FOOTJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.298
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 298
				scope:first_transition_1 = 298
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 19
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 298
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.20
	}
	option = {
		# 299: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE -> EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.299
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 299
				scope:first_transition_1 = 299
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 19
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 299
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.21
	}
	option = {
		# 300: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE -> EventsSex.MF_DICK_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.300
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 300
				scope:first_transition_1 = 300
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 19
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 300
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.23
	}
	option = {
		# 301: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE -> EventsSex.MF_ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.301
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 301
				scope:first_transition_1 = 301
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 19
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 301
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.22
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}
	after = {
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
}
LIDAf.20 = {
	# MF_MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE_INITIAL: A Chance Encounter
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.20.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.20.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:root_stamina
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:courtyard
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_WHIP_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 302
				}
			}
			# MF_FOOTJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 303
				}
			}
			# MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 304
				}
			}
			# MF_DICK_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 305
				}
			}
			# MF_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 306
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_WHIP_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 302
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 302
				}
			}
			# MF_FOOTJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 303
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 303
				}
			}
			# MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 304
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 304
				}
			}
			# MF_DICK_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 305
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 305
				}
			}
			# MF_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 306
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 306
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:first_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = first_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 302: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.MF_WHIP_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.302
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 302
				scope:first_transition_1 = 302
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 20
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 302
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.19
	}
	option = {
		# 303: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.MF_FOOTJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.303
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 303
				scope:first_transition_1 = 303
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 20
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 303
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.20
	}
	option = {
		# 304: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.304
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 304
				scope:first_transition_1 = 304
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 20
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 304
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.21
	}
	option = {
		# 305: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.MF_DICK_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.305
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 305
				scope:first_transition_1 = 305
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 20
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 305
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.23
	}
	option = {
		# 306: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.MF_ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.306
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 306
				scope:first_transition_1 = 306
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 20
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 306
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.22
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}
	after = {
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
	}
